title: Intent-First Internal Support (Core)
description: Define the AI front door for HR/IT/Ops so employees explain intent once and the right team responds faster with an auditable trail.

title: Operational Microcosms (Safe Demo Environments)
description: Replicate critical data, workflows, and system handoffs in a safe sandbox so leaders can see the end-to-end flow without guesswork. Use synthetic or redacted data so approvals happen faster without exposing sensitive records. Keep every action non-production so teams can test decisions with zero operational blast radius. Show concrete outcomes early so buy-in is earned faster and rollout risk drops.

title: Ticket Routing & Triage Automation
description: Reduce misroutes and speed up resolution with intent detection, priority rules, and smart handoffs across systems.

title: HR & Policy Q&A (Benefits, PTO, Retirement)
description: Answer routine questions with cited policies so HR spends less time repeating itself and more time on exceptions.

title: Helpdesk Deflection (Password resets, access requests)
description: Deflect repetitive tickets with guided self-service while preserving approvals and escalation paths.

title: Human-in-the-Loop Governance
description: Set approval, override, and escalation steps by risk level so named owners stay in control. AI pauses for sign-off on high-risk actions, and every decision, rationale, and outcome is logged for audit.
